TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProfileMigrateEventHandler(object sender, ProfileMigrateEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProfileMigrateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProfileMigrateEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProfileMigrateEventArgs)
public delegate void ProfileMigrateEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProfileMigrateEventArgs ^ e);
type ProfileMigrateEventHandler = delegate of obj * ProfileMigrateEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 类的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 类的 事件定义 委托。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 可以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中访问 类的 事件，如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic. 当某个用户已使用应用程序日志以匿名方式使用时，可以使用 事件将配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件复制到经过身份验证的配置文件。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when someone who has been anonymously using your application logs in. 当启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，ASP.NET 将创建一个 `ProfileCommon`类型的新类，该类继承自 类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 当基于 web.config 文件中指定的配置文件属性生成 `ProfileCommon` 类时，将添加一个 `GetProfile` 方法，使您能够根据用户名检索 `ProfileCommon` 对象。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 您可以使用当前配置文件的 `GetProfile` 方法检索匿名配置文件的属性值。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 然后，可以将匿名属性值复制到经过身份验证的用户的当前配置文件。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个 web.config 文件，该文件启用了匿名身份验证，并在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中包含了 事件。The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 下面的代码示例演示一个 web.config 文件，该文件启用支持匿名用户的匿名标识和配置文件属性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中包含的 事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件会将配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件复制到当前用户的配置文件。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述
